attributes.action: SAVE Templars Tennis club in St Andrews road NW11 0PJ from being developed.
attributes.additional_details:
The original Club rules were for the club to never be sold but as chairmen have changed these rules have been changed too.

The current members will all receive a payout from the price the club is sold.

Has been listed with Savills for sale and indicated for the development of 52 Flats. 

Link below:
http://commercialsearch.savills.co.uk/content/assets/6996/Templars%20LTC,%20St%20Andrews%20Road,%20London%20NW11%200PJ%20-%20Brochure.pdf
attributes.background:
Formed in 1923 and located at St Andrews Road London NW11 0PJ, has been run as a member’s only club. 

Unfortunately for the last decade it has been run very poorly to discouraged new memberships. 

This is probably to have justification in having the land sold to be developed into Flats.
